nodes.text: Null was an arboreal world and the only inhabited planet in the Null system.

It was the location of a castle retreat of Count Dooku during the Clone Wars and was one of the first worlds to join the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The Battle of Null was fought in 22 BBY. The planet attracted hunters of its native game animals and was home to imported whisper birds from Yavin 4. Count Dooku's childhood enemy Lorian Nod was killed by Dooku's hand on Null.
In the years following the Battle of Endor, Null was in Warlord Zsinj's Empire. Zsinj lost the planet after a combined New Republic/Imperial raid in 8 ABY.
